name: Mantel Clock
maker: Movement by Julien Le Roy, and dial enameled by Antoine-Nicolas Martinière, Case by Unknown
description: Mantel Clock; Movement by Julien Le Roy (French, 1686 - 1759, master 1713), and dial enameled by Antoine-Nicolas Martinière (French, 1706 - 1784, master 1720), Case by Unknown; Paris, France; about 1742; Gilt bronze, enameled metal; 46 x 32.4 x 20.6 cm (18 1/8 x 12 3/4 x 8 1/8 in.); 79.DB.4; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
